name: Cyberdillo
description:
Cyberdillo is a first-person shooter in which the player takes the role of the Cyberdillo, an armadillo who was run over by a car and was made into a cyborg. Starting off with a plunger gun, Cyberdillo must collect items such as platform shoes or bellbottoms to progress to the next level. Enemies the player come across include hairspray and bipedal hotdogs.

Cyberdillo received mixed to negative reviews from video game critics.
